item.title: The way out of this immigration spiral
item.description: Congress can step in to stop the president from overreaching on immigration.

item.title: Bill Foege’s optimism helped save the world from smallpox
item.description: His design of “surveillance-containment” changed the course of public health strategy.

item.title: The ‘junk fees’ Mamdani supports
item.description: The socialist mayor doesn’t want hotels to account for costs imposed by his government.

item.title: Why the pope is right to weigh in on AI
item.description: Popes throughout history have been the promoters of science but also provided necessary moral guardrails.

item.title: Ignoring security threats, Starmer caves to China on mega-embassy
item.description: Britain’s Labour government unwisely grants the Communist regime a prime location in London.

item.title: What I discovered about Josh Shapiro at the Pennsylvania Farm Show
item.description: Gov. Josh Shapiro champions a 67-county strategy to win voters in a critical battleground state.

item.title: The meaning of sanctuary
item.description: Hijacking a house of worship to make a political point will only backfire.

item.title: Jack Smith is in First Amendment denial
item.description: The former special counsel defends an indefensible bid to gag Donald Trump as he ran for president.

item.title: The TikTok divestment deal doesn’t go far enough
item.description: ByteDance will maintain ownership of the app’s coveted algorithm and license it to the spinoff.

item.title: Sending Iran another deterrence message
item.description: The regime kills and tortures protesters despite a White House warning.
